snippet: Prince Ali bin al-Hussein said he would fight “deep-seated corruption and political deal-making” and make FIFA, soccer’s scandal-scarred global governing body, more transparent.
abstract: Jordanian Prince Ali bin al-Hussein announces he will run for FIFA presidency; promises to fight corruption in organization.
lead_paragraph: Prince Ali bin al-Hussein said he would fight “deep-seated corruption and political deal-making” and make FIFA, soccer’s scandal-scarred global governing body, more transparent.

headline.main: Prince Ali of Jordan Says He Will Seek FIFA’s Presidency
headline.print_headline: Jordanian Prince Says He Will Seek FIFA’s Presidency

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Ali bin al-Hussein, Prince of Jordan
